name: Akamai Technologies
description: We are the leading provider of #cloud services for delivering, optimizing and securing online content and business applications across any #device, anywhere.

apis.name: Akamai
apis.description:
Akami is a cloud platform solutions provider. Akami offers products and solutions for enterprise that are built on the cloud. The Akami Intelligence Platform offers users scalability and adaptability for their cloud-based applications and services.

The Akami Intelligence Platform APIs allow developers to access and integrate the functionality of Akami with other applications. Some example API methods include retrieving billing information, accessing account information, and running diagnostics.
